description: Feature Development Workflow hooks for progress tracking, session recovery, and loop control

hooks.description: Prevent exit during active loop iterations

hooks.prompt: If this session involved smart-dev, check if there are any in-progress features in .works/spec/*/progress.md. If found, update the progress.md file with current state, phase, and any important context that would help resume the work later.

hooks.description: Block spec edits after readiness gate passes
